resources.string: Tap to add your contact information

1. If you install this app via Google Play, Google will collect information about your device and show me them in the Google Play console. In case of a crash some information will be uploaded to Google. I have no control over this. Please refer to their privacy policy for details.
 2. If you install this app via F-Droid, I cannot see any usage data. Please refer to their privacy policy for details.
 3. If running a device with Auto Backup by Google, Google will upload all information to Google Drive: https://developer.android.com/guide/topics/data/autobackup
 4. You can mail me at characterdog.apps@gmail.com. In this case I and Google will know your e-mail address and everything your write in your mail. I will delete your mail after your issue has been solved or your question has been answered. Google may have a backup of the mail and not delete it when I do so.
 5. If you click a link on the About screen the websites' operator may collect information about your device, but not about your contact information.
 6. I will not share the information with anybody else.
